subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Starter Bartolo Colon gave up home runs to Mike Trout, Albert Pujols and Raul Ibanez in the first inning, as Los Angeles collected eight extra-base hits and nine runs in five innings off him.
snippet: Starter Bartolo Colon gave up home runs to Mike Trout, Albert Pujols and Raul Ibanez in the first inning, as Los Angeles collected eight extra-base hits and nine runs in five innings off him.
